doc":{"details":"Based on vLUX pattern from @luxfi/contracts VE-TOKENOMICS: \u250c\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2510 \u2502  Lock PARS for 1 week to 4 years                                           \u2502 \u2502  Longer lock = More voting power                                           \u2502 \u2502                                                                             \u2502 \u2502  vePARS = PARS_amount * (lock_time / MAX_LOCK_TIME)                         \u2502 \u2502                                                                             \u2502 \u2502  Example:                                                                   \u2502 \u2502  - 1000 PARS locked 4 years = 1000 vePARS                                   \u2502 \u2502  - 1000 PARS locked 1 year  = 250 vePARS                                    \u2502 \u2502  - 1000 PARS locked 1 week  = ~5 vePARS                                     \u2502 \u2502                                                                             \u2502 \u2502  Voting power decays linearly as lock expires                               \u2502 \u2502                                                                             \u2502 \u2502  USE CASES:                                                                 \u2502 \u2502  - Vote on CYRUS protocol parameters                                        \u2502 \u2502  - Vote on treasury allocations                                             \u2502 \u2502  - Propose and vote on governance changes                                   \u2502 \u2502  - Participate in gauge weight voting                                       \u2502 \u2514\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2518","errors":{"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized params.unlockTime: Timestamp when lock expires (rounded down to week)

balanceOf(address).notice: Get current voting power for user

balanceOfAt(address,uint256).notice: Get voting power at specific timestamp

totalSupplyAt(uint256).notice: Get total voting power at timestamp

withdraw().notice: Withdraw all tokens after lock expires
